22:10:56 [Information] () Action started : Northwind.Web.MVC.Controllers.ProductsController.Index (Northwind.Web.MVC)


22:10:56 [Information] () Started reading configurations "Products", trying to get section M..

22:10:56 [Information] () Ended reading configurations "Products", got value of section M : 5

22:10:57 [Information] () Entity Framework Core "3.0.0" initialized '"NorthwindContext"' using provider '"Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer"' with options: "None"

22:10:57 [Information] () Executing DbCommand [Parameters=["@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)"], CommandType='Text', CommandTimeout='30']"
""SELECT [t].[ProductID], [t].[CategoryID], [t].[Discontinued], [t].[ProductName], [t].[QuantityPerUnit], [t].[ReorderLevel], [t].[SupplierID], [t].[UnitPrice], [t].[UnitsInStock], [t].[UnitsOnOrder], [s].[SupplierID], [s].[Address], [s].[City], [s].[CompanyName], [s].[ContactName], [s].[ContactTitle], [s].[Country], [s].[Fax], [s].[HomePage], [s].[Phone], [s].[PostalCode], [s].[Region], [c].[CategoryID], [c].[CategoryName], [c].[Description], [c].[Picture]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [p].[ProductID], [p].[CategoryID], [p].[Discontinued], [p].[ProductName], [p].[QuantityPerUnit], [p].[ReorderLevel], [p].[SupplierID], [p].[UnitPrice], [p].[UnitsInStock], [p].[UnitsOnOrder]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Suppliers] AS [s] ON [t].[SupplierID] = [s].[SupplierID]
